title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 128.3 - Work within limits of department contract
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 128.3 - Work within limits of department contract

State Regulations

Permits issued for work within the limits of a department
contract shall contain the following special condition: "The permittee will
conduct his work in collaboration and conformity with the work schedule which
the State's Contractor has submitted to and which has been approved by the
regional director in accordance with the requirements of the Standard

Specifications of January 2, 1973, or any approved amendments to that
schedule."
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17

128.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
